text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Be it the materialization of a resplendent tiara. Be it the final jeweled crown carrying the chrysanthemum kikka badge.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Be it the fervent competition for the esteemed autumn shield. 
They paint the later weeks of fall in a rich palette of colors.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Mikoshi weave through the streets to the rhythm of festival drums. Beautiful dances are offered to the three goddesses, while horsegirl archers dispel misfortune with their arrows.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
This is a festival by the horsegirls, for the horsegirls, 
and of the horsegirls ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: The Festival of Illustrious Equines is just around the corner～! I'm not missing out on the traditional grilled carrots this year! Gotta hit those stalls early!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
I'm super excited for all the performances by the different 
horsegirl communities. I wonder what Tracen Academy is 
responsible for this year…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ladies and gentlemen, as you are all aware, 
the much anticipated annual "Festival of 
Illustrious Equines" is approaching swiftly.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: We have received our official assignments by the URA. Us here at Tracen Academy will be responsible for two key performances: the "Votive Dance" and "Yabusame".

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I will hereby announce the participants for each performance. 
Though participation is voluntary, I am confident that you will 
embrace these roles with honor.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
First up, for the "Votive Dance" offered to the three 
goddesses, our first dancer is — Gold City.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Following her, our second dancer — Curren Chan. 
Lastly, our third and final dancer ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, can we leave early for the Festival?! 
I'm dying to get a good spot for the Votive Dance!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
City as a dancer is gonna be mesmerizing, isn't she～? 
And Curren's stage presence is always on point ——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Oh dear…… ughaaaaaaaa…

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: An ingredibly popular model like Ms. City and an in… infruensur? like Ms. Curren…

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Ohh id's understandable with how important that dance for the 
goddesses be that 'ems sparkly gals be chosen… ohh but……!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yukino…… hey, Yukino? 
You're looking a bit pale. 
Is everything okay?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry about that! I'll silence my phone.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no, it's fine… was that a "Neighce" alert? 
From your umm, Umasta, Ms. Curren?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I posted about participating in the Votive Dance so they 
should come see! Everyone seems excited about it, and that 
makes me a happy Curren♪

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: "Everyone"…… Just out of curiosity… umm, how many neighces does it have now…?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Right now? Let's see… 26k? Oh, just hit 27k!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Twenty-seven thousand?! B-But you only posted it 10 minutes ago, right!? Eeeeeeeeek……!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(Ms. City's manager also posted…… 
and it's nearing 10k neighces already!?)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(Everyone be so eager to see Ms. City and Ms. Curren dance…! 
I can dodally see why… which makes me feel……!)

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah! Do you mind if I snap a shot of us three together 
later to post and show everyone our excited group?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: We're in this together, Yukino!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ye… yes ma'ammmm～…!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (What am I s'pposed ta do～～～!?)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"Can't wait for the pretty dance", "You're gonna look 
so stunning", "Please share lots of pics in costume"……

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ……… Sigh… I guess that's why I was chosen ——

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
—— In conclusion, you are all free to go! Put forth your best leg 
in the "Festival of Illustrious Equines Preparation Camp"!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Anticipation!! I look forward to this festival like anyone else!! 
Naturally I won't miss the beauty of the Votive Dance, but ——

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Sheer courage!! Symboli Rudolf, Narita Brian. Your Yabusame performance will be a sight to behold as well, I'll be there for sure!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …… Much appreciated.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Chairwoman. Receiving these roles 
is an honor and we will wholeheartedly dedicate 
ourselves to their fulfilment.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
… The racing world has been abuzz with excitement lately, 
owing to the horsegirls pulling out all the stops.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
As such, this year's "Festival of Illustrious Equines", 
with its prayers for their further growth and safety, 
carries even greater weight than before.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
However, I am confident that we are more 
than capable of meeting this challenge.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Expect great things, Chairwoman. We promise to make this 
year's Festival of Illustrious Equines more thrilling than ever!
